text: Harold Edward Stassen (April 13, 1907 â€“ March 4, 2001) was an American politician. He was a member of the Republican Party. Stassen was born in West St. Paul, Minnesota. He studied at the University of Minnesota Law School. He was the 25th Governor of Minnesota. He served as governor from 1939 to 1943. He ran for President of the United States nine times in the Republican primaries from 1944 to 1992 (1944, 1948, 1952, 1964, 1968, 1980, 1984, 1988, and 1992). Stassen married Esther G. Glewwe in 1929. Their marriage would last until his death in 2001. They had two children; Glenn and Kathleen. Stassen died in Bloomington, Minnesota from natural causes, aged 93. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1907 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Governors of Minnesota Category:Politicians from Saint Paul, Minnesota Category:1964 United States presidential candidates Category:1968 United States presidential candidates Category:1984 United States presidential candidates Category:1988 United States presidential candidates Category:1992 United States presidential candidates Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Harold Stassen
